long_description: Choose this 6-pack of Riverside Cam Straps for securing your gear to the roof of your car. 1 in. heavy-duty polypropylene webbing threads into the galvanized buckles that have buckle protectors to prevent scratching. Center-spring mounted cams offer a strong, secure grip of the webbing. Straps feature angle-cut ends with flat-iron finished tips. Includes six 15 ft. straps. Closeout.
short_description: Choose this 6-pack of Riverside Cam Straps for securing your gear to the roof of your car.
